testcase.classname: User avoids mistakes while registering to BVG
testcase.name: User fails to register without inserting 'Vorname'
testcase.failure:
Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user clicks on Registirieren button....................................passed And user verifies landing on Registrierung page.............................passed And user inserts Nachname "Uyar"............................................passed And user inserts unregistered E-Mail "bvgtester2@gmail.com".................passed And user inserts Passwort "juniorTester123."................................passed And user inserts the same password to Passwort Bestätigen "juniorTester123.".passed And user clicks on Jetzt Registrieren button................................passed Then user is warned to insert Vorname "Bitte gib eine Vorname ein.".........failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:87) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:53) at com.bvg.step_definitions.RegistrationStepDefinitions.userIsWarnedToInsertVorname(RegistrationStepDefinitions.java:53) at ✽.user is warned to insert Vorname "Bitte gib eine Vorname ein."(file:///C:/Users/aliek/IdeaProjects/BVG_Project/src/test/resources/features/register.feature:17)

testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user clicks on Registirieren button....................................passed And user verifies landing on Registrierung page.............................passed And user inserts Vorname "Ali Ekrem"........................................passed And user inserts Nachname "Uyar"............................................passed And user inserts unregistered E-Mail "bvgtester2@gmail.com".................passed And user inserts invalidPasswortOne "tester"................................passed And user inserts the same password to Passwort Bestätigen "tester"..........passed And user clicks on Jetzt Registrieren button................................passed Then user is warned to insert valid password with at least one special character through following message "Ungültiges Passwort: Es muss mindestens 1 Sonderzeichen beinhalten.".passed

testcase.classname: User avoids mistakes while registering to BVG
testcase.name: User fails to register by inserting existing 'E-Mail', invalid and non-identical 'Passwort'
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user clicks on Registirieren button....................................passed And user verifies landing on Registrierung page.............................passed And user inserts Vorname "Ali Ekrem"........................................passed And user inserts Nachname "Uyar"............................................passed And user inserts registered E-Mail "aliekremuyar55@gmail.com"...............passed And user inserts invalidPasswortSix "tester"................................passed And user inserts the same password to Passwort Bestätigen "juniorTester123.".passed And user clicks on Jetzt Registrieren button................................passed Then user is warned to insert unregistered E-Mail, valid password and confirm the password through following messages "E-Mail existiert bereits." "Ungültiges Passwort: Es muss mindestens 1 Sonderzeichen beinhalten." "Die Passwortbestätigung ist nicht identisch.".passed
